channel.title: Image on Steve Good
channel.description: Recent content in Image on Steve Good

item.title: Uploading an image from iOS 5
item.description: Lately I’ve been working steadily towards getting an iOS app released for my company, KaiNexus. The first pass at this app will have the basic ability to submit an idea from your phone and be able to attach a picture. Since I am still a novice with Objective-C it was no surprise when I ran into a brick wall when trying to upload the image from the app. This prompted me to ask on stackoverflow to see what I had done wrong.
